content:
You are an expert in Common Sense.
Your task is to answer the following multiple-choice questions.
Think step-by-step to ensure you have the correct answer.
Then, answer the question using the following format 'Action: Answer("[choice]")'  
The parameter [choice] is the letter or number of the answer you want to select (e.g. "A", "B", "C", or "D")
For example, 'Answer("C")' will select the choice "C" as the best answer.
You MUST select one of the available choices; the answer CANNOT be "None of the Above".
Be concise in your response but include any essential information.

Topic: Geography
Question: What is the capital of the state where Johns Hopkins University is located?
Choices:
  A: Baltimore
  B: Annapolis
  C: Des Moines
  D: Las Vegas

Thought: 
Johns Hopkins University is located in Baltimore, Maryland.
The capital of Maryland is Annapolis.
Action: Answer("B")

Topic: Common Sense
Subtopic: Work World
Question: What is the most likely completion to the following text?
[header] How to escape extreme pressure employment [title] Come to grips with the fact that you can't take it anymore. [step] The lower you've hit bottom, the higher you will go. Consider stopping caring about your work/colleagues criticism and you might feel more relaxed in the short term.
Choices:
  A: Richard templar says in the rules of wealth act as if you don't need the money and people will no longer have power over you. [title] Believe, from deep in your gut, that you can do better.
  B: But as time goes on, the hard way tends to become ever harder. Stop caring about what others say/look at what they like.
  C: [substeps] Don't be afraid to look back on and the future. Remind yourself that it is impossible to work your way to the top, but soon you will be jumping from top to bottom like a desperate schoolgirl.
  D: Give your notice to somebody who simply deserves it. This is an integral part of the healthy and productive life you lead.
Reflection:
You previously answered this question incorrectly.
Then you reflected on the problem, your solution, and the correct answer.
Use your self-reflection (below) to help you answer this question.
Any information that you are not allowed to see will be marked [REDACTED].
Solution:
The text offers advice on how to escape extreme pressure in employment, and the choices provide potential additional steps or mindsets to adopt. 
Choice [REDACTED] provides a perspective on wealth and power dynamics, suggesting that acting as if one doesn't need the money can reduce the power others hold over you. 
This choice aligns with the theme of the text, which is about regaining control and power in a high-pressure work environment. 
It offers a deeper insight into the dynamic between employees and their employers, which is a common sense interpretation of the text's message.

Thought: 
The text offers advice on how to cope with extreme pressure in the workplace. It suggests accepting your situation and stopping caring about criticism to relieve stress.
Choice A provides additional advice from Richard Templar, suggesting that adopting a mindset of financial independence can reduce the power others have over you. This choice aligns with the theme of the text and offers a strategic approach to regaining control in a challenging work environment.
Action: Answer("A")
